title: LISTEN: The Debate - Feb 2: Tim Sherwood and Danny Murphy
description: Danny Murphy and Tim Sherwood joined Geoff Shreeves on The Debate to discuss a host of topics ahead of a hectic weekend of Premier League football.
content: Riyad Mahrez has dominated the headlines this week after missing out on a Deadline Day move to Manchester City, and the panel have some sympathy for the Algeria international as he seeks a move away from Leicester.The next England captain was also a hot topic, with the merits of appointing a permanent skipper discussed, with Harry Kane mentioned as a potential candidate.There was also time to discuss how well other January signings will settle in, whether or not Theo Walcott should celebrate against former club Arsenal, as well as taking time to answer your questions.For all that and more, listen to the latest edition of The Debate podcast.Never miss an episode of the The Debate by subscribing via iTunes
